mapper.insert: insert into afb(afb_name, afb_number, afb_bDate, afb_rDate, afb_usefor, afb_bName, afb_bTele, afb_facultyID, afb_isPermited) values (#{afb_name}, #{afb_number}, #{afb_bDate}, #{afb_rDate}, #{afb_usefor}, #{afb_bName}, #{afb_bTele}, #{afb_facultyID}, #{afb_isPermited})
mapper.update: update afb set afb_name=#{afb_name}, afb_number=#{afb_number}, afb_bDate=#{afb_bDate}, afb_rDate=#{afb_rDate}, afb_usefor=#{afb_usefor}, afb_bName=#{afb_bName}, afb_bTele=#{afb_bTele}, afb_facultyID=#{afb_facultyID}, afb_isPermited=#{afb_isPermited} where afb_ID = #{afb_ID}
